info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 12:32PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...DANGEROUSLY COLD TEMPERATURES AND SLICK ROADS EXPECTED TONIGHT... Winter weather has come to a close across our region, however any snow and ice that melts this afternoon will quickly refreeze after sunset. This will cause hazardous travel conditions overnight and for the early morning commute on Friday. Beware of black ice, particularly on bridges and overpasses, as well as other elevated surfaces including sidewalks and parking lots. Motorists should exercise caution by slowing down and increasing following distance. In addition to rough travel conditions, extreme cold is expected overnight with sub zero degree wind chills in many locations. Prepare for the cold weather by protecting pipes, plants, pets, and checking on the vulnerable.
